common.Event_description: You feel someone's watching you, you realise it's an ambush!
You accidentally activated the trap and poisonous gas quickly fills the room.
You accidentally stepped on a hidden plate and activated spike trap.
You enter room and see shrine to the unknown goddes in the middle.
You enter small cave, filled with smoke

rare.Event_description: You feel temperature around you rises, room sets on fire.
You enter room covered in ice, the temperature here is freezing cold.

epic.Event_description: You encounter massive gates, blocking your path, as you approache them you hear loud voice, challenging you to enter the room and defeat powerfull enemies.

special.Event_description: You enter large room and see massive enemy in the middle - boss of this level.
